name: Perseverance
description:
Perseverance is a puzzle game set on Mars.

Perseverance, is a cat astronaut in his Rover, on a space mission on Mars in search of life. Help him to return to planet earth by solving the puzzles.

Get the microorganisms to solve the levels.

Features:
40 friendly craft levels with increasing complexity.
Originally composed Soundtracks.
Beautiful minimalist aesthetic.
Undo moves.
Day and night mode.
